text: The Metropolitan Borough of Trafford is a metropolitan borough of Greater Manchester, England. It is home to 211,800 people, Retrieved on 17 December 2007. covers 41 square miles, Retrieved on 13 December 2007. and includes the towns of Altrincham, Partington, Sale, Stretford, and Urmston. Until 1974 the area was part of Cheshire. ==References== ==Other websites== * www.trafford.gov.uk , Trafford Council. * www.trafford.nhs.uk , Trafford NHS website.
title: Trafford
